## edwr

The `edwr` package provides a set of standardized functions for reading,
tidying, and transforming data which was extracted from the Enterprise Data
Warehouse (EDW) using the standardized EDW queries.

## Installation

The `edwr` package can be installed from GitHub using the `devtools` package and
the following commands:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)

install_github("bgulbis\edwr")
```
